intro: Oreocharis hongheensis, commonly known as the Honghe oreocharis, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Orchidaceae family and is characterized by its unique, delicate inflorescence. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments within mountainous regions. Its flowers are small and clustered, often displaying a range of colors from white to pink. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
